main event: On July 23, 1952, a large, round white object hovered over and moved down a street in Riverside, California, emitting a noise similar to a jet aircraft as reported in a Project Blue Book document.
interesting points: The UFO was reported to have a diameter of 122 feet and a bluish-white color with an exhaust trail resembling a comet tail.
The observation occurred at 10:52 PM and lasted for one to two seconds before the object disappeared into scattered cloud cover.
Weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with high scattered clouds, and there was no activity or condition that might account for the sighting.
There were no physical evidence fragments or photos of the UFO, and no identifying actions were taken by the headquarters.
The reliability of the observer is unknown, but a librarian at the public library in the city of Riverside made a similar report around the same time and place.
sighted object: large, round white object with a bluish-white color and a comet tail-like exhaust trail
witnesses: reliability of the observer is unknown, but a librarian also made a similar report
